entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
